channel.title: Softlayer_container_hardware_configuration_option on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_hardware_configuration_option on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option Datatype Description An option found within a [[SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration (type)]] structure. Local itemPrice Provides hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price preset Provides a description of a fixed configuration preset with monthly and hourly costs. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset template Provides a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a server with the option.
